title: The Dirty dozen
creator_credit: Robert Aldrich, Kenneth Hyman and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: A tough U.S. Army Major trains a violent group of criminals for one of the most bizarre and difficult combat assignments - a suicide mission! Their task is to infilitrate a protected German retreat, a chateau in occupied France, where the upper echelon of Generals relax. Getting in and staying alive will not be easy and the action is relentless in this extraordinarly explosive suspense film. The all-star cast includes Lee Marvin, Charles Bronson, Jim Brown, Telly Savalas, Trini Lopez, Donald Sutherland, Ernest Borgnine, Richard Jaeckel, George Kennedy, Ralph Meeker and Robert Ryan.
